import React, { useState} from 'react'; import IconPic from '../../images/IsseLogo2.png'; import { UploadContainer, UploadWrapper, UploadContTop, UploadContBottom, Icon, Img, Form, FormH1, FormLabel, FormInput, FormInputFName, FormInputLName, FormTextArea, FormButton, Text, ContIn, ContSub, ContLeft, ContRight, Cont, ContMessage } from './UploadElements'; const Upload = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [pdffile, setBody] = useState('') useEffect(() => { setTitle(props.resume.title) setDescription(props.resume.pdffile) }, [props.resume]) const insertResume = () => { APIService.InsertResume({title, pdffile}) .then(resp => props.insertedInformation(resp)) } return (
Upload Form First Last Email Company/Orginaztion Phone Subject Message Submit {isClicked ? Message Sent Successfully! Thank You: }
); }; export default Upload;
